name: ring-reporter
description: Product reporter plugin marketplace: Core software engineering skills (TDD, debugging, code review), specialized developer agents (Backend, DevOps, Frontend, QA, SRE), product planning workflows (8-gate pre-dev system), and FinOps tools with Brazilian regulatory compliance templates.
